name: Engineering Team Standup - Sprint Progress
content: Daily standup meeting with Alex, Jordan, and Sam discussing sprint progress. Alex completed authentication middleware refactor and is moving to rate limiting implementation. Jordan is 60% complete on dashboard redesign but experiencing delays with charting library integration. Sam finished API versioning early and offered to pair with Jordan on data transformation. Main blocker identified: database migration approval from ops team. Team coordination is strong with proactive problem-solving.
summary: Engineering standup: Auth refactor done, dashboard 60% complete, API versioning finished, ops approval blocking next sprint
